sections.title: Master Chymist (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Master Chymist class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Master Chymist)
sections.description: Master chymists gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor beyond what they already possess.

sections.title: Extracts per Day (Master Chymist)
sections.description: At certain levels, master chymists gain additional extracts per day and increased caster level as if gaining alchemist levels, but no other alchemist benefits.

sections.title: Bomb-Thrower (Ex) (Master Chymist)
sections.description: Master chymists add their alchemist and master chymist levels together to determine bomb damage.

sections.title: Mutagenic Form (Ex) (Master Chymist)
sections.description: The master chymist's alternate personality and form that manifests during mutation, with different alignment, appearance, and goals from the normal form.

sections.title: Mutate (Su) (Master Chymist)
sections.description: Allows the master chymist to assume mutagenic form multiple times per day without consuming a mutagen, with forced transformation possible under stress.

sections.title: Advanced Mutagen (Su) (Master Chymist)
sections.description: Special powers that modify or enhance the master chymist's mutagenic form, selected at specific levels.

sections.title: Brutality (Ex) (Master Chymist)
sections.description: Provides bonus damage when attacking with simple weapons and natural attacks while in mutagenic form, increasing at higher levels.
